solution_line_template: The small panda bears eat a total of {num_small_pandas} x {bamboo_per_small_panda} = <<{num_small_pandas}*{bamboo_per_small_panda}={total_bamboo_small_pandas_daily}>>{total_bamboo_small_pandas_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.

The bigger panda bears eat a total of {num_bigger_pandas} x {bamboo_per_bigger_panda} = <<{num_bigger_pandas}*{bamboo_per_bigger_panda}={total_bamboo_bigger_pandas_daily}>>{total_bamboo_bigger_pandas_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.

So, the 9 pandas eat a total of {total_bamboo_small_pandas_daily} + {total_bamboo_bigger_pandas_daily} = <<{total_bamboo_small_pandas_daily}+{total_bamboo_bigger_pandas_daily}={total_bamboo_all_pandas_daily}>>{total_bamboo_all_pandas_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.
Therefore, they eat a total of {total_bamboo_all_pandas_daily} x {days_in_week} = <<{total_bamboo_all_pandas_daily}*{days_in_week}={total_bamboo_weekly}>>{total_bamboo_weekly} pounds in a week.
